name: Flying Spider: Stick Rope Hero
description:
Play as a Spider Stickman rope hero and save the Miami city from criminals.
If you are a fan of spider Stickman hero or Rope hero then you will enjoy this Amazing Spider Stickman Hero game.

Get ready to play Amazing Spider superhero games and enjoy the life of a Spider Stick man hero. Use your web hero skills to swing from one city area to another like mutant ninja hero.

Features:

DIfferent SHOPS with a lot of guns to buy.

Explore the Miami Grand city while driving superbikes and drifting cars.

high quality animations.

Huge variety of guns to buy.

We’d appreciate to hear your suggestions and comments.
